acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] serialize/parse roundtrip for state/tombs/deps/notes
- [ ] deterministic ordering by id/key

**Invariants to re-verify**
- [ ] Git wire serialization is deterministic (sorted by id/key/dot)
- [ ] Roundtrip preserves OR-Set metadata and orphans
description:
**Problem**
Git wire currently serializes LWW dep edges and bead-embedded notes/labels.

**Files**
- src/git/wire.rs
design:
Update serialization:
- state.jsonl contains beads + embedded labels OR-Set
- deps.jsonl uses OR-Set cc + dot sets
- notes.jsonl stores notes by bead_id
Update parse to rebuild stores + dep_indexes. Update checksums to include notes (and labels if separate).
title: Git wire: serialize OR-Set deps/labels + notes.jsonl
